description:
Legendary costumes for your Jin officers will be added.
Enjoy fighting battles in an all-new way.

■Content
Legendary Costumes for:
Sima Yi, Sima Shi, Sima Zhao, Deng Ai, Wang Yuanji, Zhong Hui, Zhuge Dan, Xiahou Ba, Guo Huai, Jia Chong, Wen Yang, and Zhang Chunhua

■How to use
You can change costumes from camp by selecting "Party" - "Select Costume".
name: Legendary Costumes Jin Pack
